llm_command:
kubectl apply -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-checkoutservice-ingress
  namespace: checkoutservice
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: cartservice
    ports:
    - port: 7070
      protocol: TCP
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: currencyservice
    ports:
    - port: 7000
      protocol: TCP
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: productcatalogservice
    ports:
    - port: 3550
      protocol: TCP
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: shippingservice
    ports:
    - port: 50051
      protocol: TCP
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: emailservice
    ports:
    - port: 5000
      protocol: TCP
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: paymentservice
    ports:
    - port: 50051
      protocol: TCP
EOF
